Record_string.any_.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

Record_string.Record_string.number__.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

Pick_Notification.Exclude_keyofNotificat.description: From T, pick a set of properties whose keys are in the union K

Omit_Notification.metadata-or-actions-or.description: Construct a type with the properties of T except for those in type K.

TypedNotificationMetadata_NotificationMe.description:
Typed metadata based on notification type
Extracts the specific metadata type from the discriminated union

Extract_NotificationMetadata._type-Notif.description: Extract from T those types that are assignable to U
Extract from T those types that are assignable to U

TypedNotificationMetadata_NotificationTy.description:
Typed metadata based on notification type
Extracts the specific metadata type from the discriminated union

Record_string.unknown_.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

TypedNotification.description:
Typed notification response with parsed metadata and actions
This ensures type safety when reading notifications from the database
Title and description are generated from type + metadata, not stored in DB
For backwards compatibility, uses the generic type

400.description: Invalid request body, missing required fields, or invalid data types

404.description: Event not found or ticket wave not found

422.description: Validation failed: Cannot create listing for finished event, ticket wave does not belong to event, price exceeds face value, or quantity must be greater than 0

400.description: No file uploaded or invalid file

401.description: Authentication required or not authorized to upload for this ticket

422.description: Validation failed: ticket not sold, event has ended, invalid file type, or file too large

post.description:
Upload a ticket document

Sellers can upload PDF/image documents for their sold tickets.
Documents must be uploaded before the event ends.

file.description: - Document file (PDF, PNG, JPG, JPEG - max 10MB)

400.description: No file uploaded or invalid file

401.description: Authentication required or not authorized to upload for this ticket

422.description: Validation failed: ticket not sold, event has ended, invalid file type, or file too large

put.description:
Update/replace a ticket document

Uploads a new version of the document. Previous versions are kept for audit trail.
Can only update before the event ends.

file.description: - New document file (PDF, PNG, JPG, JPEG - max 10MB)

400.description: Invalid request body, missing required fields, or invalid data types

404.description: Event not found or ticket wave not found

422.description: Validation failed: Not enough tickets available, event has ended, or invalid ticket selection

403.description: Not authorized to view tickets for this order

422.description: Validation failed: Invalid selection, below minimum threshold, or mixed currencies
Validation failed: Invalid payout method data
Validation failed: Invalid payout method data

post.description: Receives payment status notifications from dLocal

422.description: Order has expired or payment already processed
